page.title: 17THE CHICKEN FACTORY
page.content: Mr Joseph Mitchell owns the "Chicken Factory" in Letham which processes chickens for{frozen}or{fresh}oven- ready chickens.Started in 1920 this family business has expanded until it now processes{45,000}chickens each week.Live chickens are brought in from as far as the Midlands of England and processed chickens are transported to the shops in Mitchell's own refriger- ated lorries. Although almost fully{automated with {Dutch machinery}it employs 70 workers who come from Letham,Arbroath and Forfar.There are 3 hygiene inspectors who inspect every chicken.{A British {computer}grades the chickens by weight. The edible chicken livers are separated from the other innards which are sent with the feathers to Elgin for recycling into protein for cattle.
